five_acts.act_1_setup: Established the rollout contract, scope boundaries, and authoritative readiness/event model.
five_acts.act_2_decomposition: Decomposed the rollout into ordered child slices with explicit dependency sequencing.
five_acts.act_3_preparation: Prepared and gated each active child slice with measurable DOR evidence.
five_acts.act_4_readiness: Consolidated rollout readiness and cutover go/no-go criteria into parent evidence artifacts.
five_acts.act_5_delivery: Advanced to approved finalize flow with orchestrator-owned merge/apply and delivery bookkeeping.
